title: Brand new house @ Thalawathugoda
details:
Architecturally designed brand new three storied house is available for sale at Thalawathugoda
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Four bed rooms with 3 bathrooms
Fitted pantry
TV lobby
Space for gym or study room
Two parking spaces
Roller shutter gate and wicket gate
Rs. 27.5 Mn ( negotiable)
